title: Customize app bars
description:
With these flags (panavision nav3 or navigation refresh, it doesn't matter) you can customize the top bar and bottom bar as you like.

To change the positions of the icons, simply guide yourself by the number and change the description of the desired icon in the desired position in the feed. 

1 - Like (name= news)
2 - Direct (name= direct)
3 - Home (name= home)
4 - Research  (name= explore)
5 - Create  (name= share)
6 - Reels (name= clips)
7 - Profile (name= profile)

For now, we have some options that you can put as well. 

- menu
- quick_snap
- meta_ai
- friend_map
